name: Slicer (Ashley Muir)
description:
This was made as part of a week long Game Jam using the prompt "that's a little too easy"

A / D - Movement

Space - Jump

Mouse - Click and Drag through platforms to slice

Made by...

  • Harry O'Connor
  • Ash Muir
  • Ash Jagath

Environment Pixel Art: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset

Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/synthwave-sci-fi-music-pack-184583
